definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: There was a man called Shylock in his play The Merchant of Venice.
sentences.chinese: 在他的剧本《威尼斯商人》中，有一个人叫夏洛克。

sentences.english: I am so sympathetic with Shylock.
Today, there is no longer a copyright on the name Sherlock Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 今天，再没有关于夏洛克福尔摩斯名字的版权问题了。

sentences.english: Some years ago I heard Miss Shedlock tell stories in England.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，我曾在英国听过夏洛克老师讲故事。

sentences.english: Shylock the Jew was a well - known money lender in Venice.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛克是犹太人，在威尼斯是有名的钱庄老板。

sentences.english: The judge suggested that Shylock take the money that was offered by Bassanio and tear up the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 法官建议夏洛克拿着巴萨尼奥提供的钱，撕毁协议。

sentences.english: Sherlock deduced the man's occupation in 5 seconds and smirked.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛克5秒钟就推理出这人的职业，他得意一笑。

sentences.english: It is useless trying to argue with Shylock.
sentences.chinese: 想同夏洛克争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: In fact, I wish Shylock would retain me to launch an appeal.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我希望夏洛克聘请我做他的律师提起上诉。

definition: Sherlock Holmes, 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯[Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1]
Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (1859-1930), author of the Sherlock Holmes stories 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯
Wallis (name)/John Wallis (1616-1703), English mathematician, precursor of Newton
